column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Excellent tapas and paella. We had a group of seven on New Year's Day
column2: several of whom have been to Spain. We were all very impressed. Great food. Great service. We sampled probably half the tapas
column4: and the seafood paella. Everything was delicious! Octopus
column7: wrapped dates were notable. The paella was perfect. Dessert tapas were great fun
column8: a little sweet bite for everyone. Blood orange sangria and terrific sourdough bread rounded out our meal. Go hungry and explore.
